body_html:
It seems that two of the tests are failing. I looked at the error message which was VERY long. I searched for total_variation but it does not appear in the errors, so I don't know if the errors are related to my contributed code? Also, the other tests seem fine. Should I do anything?

Thanks for the tips on installing bazel. My concern was both whether it might break Linux - and if it would somehow override my working installations of TensorFlow. If I'm only making one or two contribs to tf-core then it didn't seem worth the risk. But I've noted your installation instructions in case I'll need to build tf in the future.

body:
It seems that two of the tests are failing. I looked at the error message which was VERY long. I searched for `total_variation` but it does not appear in the errors, so I don't know if the errors are related to my contributed code? Also, the other tests seem fine. Should I do anything?

Thanks for the tips on installing bazel. My concern was both whether it might break Linux - and if it would somehow override my working installations of TensorFlow. If I'm only making one or two contribs to tf-core then it didn't seem worth the risk. But I've noted your installation instructions in case I'll need to build tf in the future.
